title: MANIFEST.MF don't contain information anymore since 3.1.x builds
body:
### Describe the bug

Manifests used to contain information similar to:
```
───────┬───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
       │ File: META-INF/MANIFEST.MF
───────┼───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
   1   │ Manifest-Version: 1.0
   2   │ Created-By: Maven Archiver 3.4.0
   3   │ Build-Jdk-Spec: 11
   4   │ Specification-Title: Quarkus - Core - Runtime
   5   │ Specification-Version: 3.0
   6   │ Specification-Vendor: JBoss by Red Hat
   7   │ Implementation-Title: Quarkus - Core - Runtime
   8   │ Implementation-Version: 3.0.3.Final
   9   │ Implementation-Vendor: JBoss by Red Hat
  10   │ Implementation-URL: https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus
  11   │ Java-Vendor: Eclipse Adoptium
  12   │ Java-Version: 11.0.17
  13   │ Os-Arch: amd64
  14   │ Os-Name: Linux
  15   │ Os-Version: 5.15.12-200.fc35.x86_64
  16   │ Scm-Connection: scm:git:git@github.com:quarkusio/quarkus.git
  17   │ Scm-Revision: 37b8b79e07ef615b5ba8b25505c8054834cc05a4
  18   │ Scm-Url: https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus
  19   │ 
───────┴──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
```

While in 3.1.0.Final, we only get:
```
───────┬──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
       │ File: META-INF/MANIFEST.MF
───────┼──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
   1   │ Manifest-Version: 1.0
   2   │ Created-By: Maven JAR Plugin 3.3.0
   3   │ Build-Jdk-Spec: 11
   4   │ 
───────┴─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
```

### Expected behavior

Manifests should contain more information than they currently do in recent builds.

### Actual behavior

Manifests now barely contain any information.

### How to Reproduce?

_No response_

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

_No response_

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

_No response_

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

_No response_

### Additional information

Looks like an issue related to how jars are now build (archiver vs. jar plugins), hence probably related to parent update.
